Contact Details: Responsible Statistician: Sharon Thandi, Analytical Section Head Public Enquiries: 0300 303 5678 Email: enquiries@nhsdigital.nhs.uk
Description: This statistical release makes available the most recent Improving Access to Psychological Therapies (IAPT) monthly data, including activity, waiting times, and outcomes such as recovery.
Name: Psychological Therapies, Report on the use of IAPT services
Notes: There are a number of  spreadsheets available on the landing page as well as Power BI.  (IAPT) = Improving Access to Psychological Therapies  programme
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found by clicking on the link under latest version on the landing page ,  2 CSV and 5 XLS spreadsheets are located under Resources
Sizing Notes: There are a number of spreadsheets with footnotes, complex data, dimensions and sub dimensions so may need a bit of up front work required to determine dimensions. this may be better suited to the mental health family.
